decision_conditions: The proposed front dormer would, by reason of its siting, scale, and size would result in a prominent and dominant development that fails to be sympathetic to the character and appearance of the dwelling house and street scene, contrary to Policy 26 of the Havering Local Plan (adopted 2021) and the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (2011).

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy a decision was made on the application, which will enable the applicant to exercise a right of appeal if they so wish.
description: Hip to gable loft conversion with front and rear dormers, gable end window and roof lights to front
